column1: We assume you are preased with the erection results?
And you no doubt will now begin filling your side of the bargain.
Little boy, the President is on his way to pick up the ballots. Where are they?!
Alter our... The President will be here in moments with what we want!
Sssure, we have the ballots, but we don't have them right here with us now.
Mr. President, we got you reelected! Now you will give us the Star Wars technology so that we can make the sequels!
That was not the deal! We will not be a-bullied by you!
I am tired of playing games! This little farce is ovah!
You don't understand. We are trying to protect the greatest film series ever made!
